duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage JIRA and Jira Align by configuring field mapping, workflow mapping, and issue types mapping.
Automate user management and pull external custom reports to Jira Align for better visibility.
Set up connectors for different applications and understand Rest APIs to set up automation jobs.
Integrate Jira Align by configuring Jira - Jira align field mapping, workflow mapping, and issue types mapping.
Work closely with Agile CoP to oversee and manage change control over complex codebase.

education_certification.credential: Experience in using various reports and educating users on using Jira align reports.
